getRequiredDocuments

public Document[] getRequiredDocuments(Document document)
                                throws PublicationException
This method does not use the sitetree object, but it calculates the parent using the document ID. The reason for this is that the actual documents don't have to exist.

Specified by:
getRequiredDocuments in interface Publication
Parameters:
document - A document.
Returns:
An array of documents.
Throws:
PublicationException - when an error occurs.

public void copyDocument(Document sourceDocument,
                         Document destinationDocument)
                  throws PublicationException
Template method to copy a document. Override copyDocumentSource(Document, Document) to implement access to a custom repository.

Throws:
